name: Gun Fight (mstanimirov)
description:
Use W,A,S,D to move around. Move the mouse to aim and left click to shoot!

This game was made as an entry for Polyrealm Game Jam. The theme is retro game remake.

Original game:

Gun Fight (1975 Midway)

Gameplay

ASSETS

All assets are made by me using Magicavoxel and Piskel.

Sound effects by ZapSplat.
